Convert between XYZ and RGB color image representation.
xyzToLab(float[], float[]) - Static method in class util.ColorSpaceConversion
Conversion from CIE XYZ to CIE L*a*b* assuming Observer. = 2Â°, Illuminant = D65.
xyzToRGB(float[], float[]) - Static method in class util.ColorSpaceConversion
XYZ to sRGB conversion based on conversion coefficients at: http://www.brucelindbloom.com/Eqn_XYZ_to_RGB.html

Conversion from CIE XYZ to sRGB as defined in the IEC 619602-1 standard (http://www.colour.org/tc8-05/Docs/colorspace/61966-2-1.pdf) r_linear = +3.2404542 * X - 1.5371385 * Y - 0.4985314 * Z; g_linear = -0.9692660 * X + 1.8760108 * Y + 0.0415560 * Z; b_linear = +0.0556434 * X - 0.2040259 * Y + 1.0572252 * Z; r = r_linear > 0.0031308 ?

xyzToRGBMatrix(float[][]) - Static method in class util.ColorSpaceConversion
Converts a XYZ float matrix into a RGB float matrix
